channel.title: Projects on Drew Zauel | Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Drew Zauel | Portfolio

item.title: WeTrade: AI-Powered Automated Stock Trading
item.description: An automated stock trading system using an LSTM neural network that combines technical analysis and news sentiment to democratize long-term investing.

item.title: WeCode: AI-Powered Coding Education Platform
item.description: An AI-driven platform that personalizes coding education, built in 24 hours. Awarded Best Web Hack at HackTJ 2024 for its innovative approach.
